roleset.name: cut short, skimp

example.name: scant-v: agentive skimper
example.text: We had to scant the older children in order to nourish the newborn.
example.arg: in order to nourish the newborn.

example.name: scant-v: non-agentive skimper
example.text: Our leisure time is scanted by this demanding job.

roleset.note: SCANT-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie. (from scant.01-v)

roleset.name: spare in quality or quantity

example.name: scant-j
example.text: No notable hydrologic events occurred in April, as precipitation was scant.

roleset.note: SCANT-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from scant.01-j)
